Click the "Add" button to add up to 10 new guests at a time. All fields are required. The new guest will not be added if any fields are missing.
Copy Guest List
You can copy all guests from another meeting plan by specifying the meeting plan access code located at the bottom of the meeting plan page to be copied.

Click the "Add New Guests" button below to add members to your guest list. Click the "Send Invitations Now" button to send your invitation to all New guests. Click on the pencil icon to edit. You can resend an invitation by changing the status to New.
